title: CSS Box Model
description: Understand and apply the CSS box model using margin, padding, border, and content.

examples.input: Box Model Example
examples.output: A box with 200px width, 20px padding, 5px border, and 15px margin.

constraints: Use margin, padding, border, and width properties.
Make sure at least one side has a different padding or margin.
Border must be visible with a solid style.
starterCode: Box Model Demo
hints: Content is the inner text or image.
Padding adds space inside the border.
Margin adds space outside the border.
